title: How much does it cost to host Eurovision? - Quora

response.answer_text: EBU give the organizers about 5-6 million euro (which is a registration fee from the participation countries). Rest of the budget is covered by the host broadcaster, advertisment partners and the host state. So in this case sky is the limit, but EBU directive is usually 10–20 million euro. So about 15 -25 million euro is the average budget for the show. Some budget from the past 2019, Tel Aviv ~ 28m euros2018, Lisbon ~ 20m 2017, Kiev ~ 30m2016, Stockholm ~ 14m2015, Vienna ~ 26m2014, Copenhagen ~ 25m

I’ve seen a number of reports that staging an ESC can cost as much as 30 million Euros these days, as it reportedly did when the event was staged in Norway. Estonia and Ukraine were extremely nervous about hosting it for that reason, and countries are attempting to rein in costs by holding it at much less extravagant venues (like next year’s event in Sweden) or – more drastically – telling their contestants to do everything in their power NOT to win it!
